tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Advice helps my son get well soon..dr. Avneet kaur advice makes me feel realise dat being a mother i hv to be strict for my son diet..as my son dint wana eat/drink anythg except milk..my son is feeling well * ********* **** thro dr prescribed medicine n diet...thank you dr.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My now 11 month old daughter had frequent wheezing episodes just few months after her birth. Dr. Avneet explained us of the diagnosis, we being totally unaware of it. The doctor helped us go through to these episodes & successfully cured my baby of the same. My daughter also had stomach infections twice which was handled by the doctor really well. The doctor also offers excellent nutritional guidance for kids. I would highly recommend for all pediatric related concerns.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ** ***** **** ** *** ** *** ****** ************* ********* ** *****. The way she treats all her patients with so much care and attention is very rare to be seen in such busy schedules of doctors nowadays. The way she guides you and explain you the treatment in detail helps you understand the procedure and treatment required for the ailment for which you visiting her. In brief I highly recommend her to everyone ** *** ** *** **** *** *** * **** ********* ********* ** *** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She never prescribes antibiotics for the babies if they can recover without them. Prescribes very light and safe dosage .. also deals with them very patiently and also interacts with them to make the baby more comfortable.. and the best part is she is always available in emergeny on calls and well on whatsapp .!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Dr Avneet is an approachable doctor , always ready to help be it hospital or on phone in circumstances during odd hours . She is very sensitive towards handling our kid, she's never in a hurry to prescribe medicines and firstly asks us to take natural things before shifting to medicines only when required .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My baby is 2 months old and this is my first child, hence the innumerable queries because everything is new to me. Dr. Avneet is great, she listens with patience and explains everything properly. *** ********* ** ****** **** *** ********* ********** ** *********** 
Thank you so much doctor.

tags: None
review:
She is an amazing doctor. We went with our 3 weeks old baby who had some skin rashes and problem. The doctor helped us by explaining why did it occurred and prescribed medicines, it's just been 2 days and the treatment is already showing results. 

The best thing about doctor is that she patiently listen to what parents have to say and then gives them logical reasoning.  Never looks in a rush to complete the appointment.
